articles.title: Google rolls out AI-powered search in Pakistan
articles.author: Fact Check Iverify
articles.summary: Google has launched its new 'AI Mode' in Pakistan. This AI-powered search experience, powered by Gemini 2.5, allows users to ask longer, more complex questions and receive deeper, smarter search results for tasks like planning trips or getting educational support. The feature can be accessed via the Google app on Android and iOS, as well as on mobile and desktop web.

articles.title: Media Words releases national Woolworths campaign for premium hot chocolate brand
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Woolworths launched 'Indulge Your Senses,' a premium drinking chocolate, supported by a multi-channel campaign from Media Words. The campaign includes out-of-home advertising, digital video, and influencer strategies targeting both Gen Z and older demographics to drive awareness and sales through Woolworths' national store network. Early data indicates the product's sales are exceeding forecasts.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington. This launch marks the first time the Australian treat is widely sold on the high street in the United Kingdom.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington, an Australian treat. This launch marks the first time the product will be widely sold on the high street in the United Kingdom.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington. This initiative marks the first time the Australian treat will be widely available on the high street in the United Kingdom.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its own version of the lamington. This marks the first time the Australian treat will be widely sold on the UK high street.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: AAP Newswire
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington. This marks the first time the Australian treat is widely sold on the high street in the United Kingdom.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching a lamington, marking the first time this Australian treat will be widely available on the UK high street.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington. This marks the first time the Australian treat will be widely available on the UK high street.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington. This marks the first time the Australian treat is widely available on the high street in the United Kingdom.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington. The company claims it's the first time the Australian treat is widely sold on the UK high street.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: AAP Newswire
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington. The company claims this is the first time the Australian treat will be widely sold on the high street in the United Kingdom.

articles.title: Top treat: Lamingtons set to hit the shelves in the UK
articles.author: Josie Clarke
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is launching its version of the lamington. This marks the first time the Australian treat is widely sold on the UK high street.

articles.title: Labor Day Is Nearly Here! Shop the Best Mattress and Bedding Deals, up to 69% Off
articles.author: Jannely Espinal
articles.summary: Several sleep products are being introduced or promoted, including memory foam mattresses with cooling technology, adjustable bed bases, and pillows designed for different sleeping positions. Discounts and promotional codes are offered on select items like the 'Bio-Pur' pillow.

articles.title: Lightning Plugins Unveils Lightning DTPrep: A Breakthrough Photoshop Plug-In That Redefines DTF & DTG Artwork Preparation
articles.summary: Lightning Plugins has launched Lightning DTPrep, a Photoshop plug-in designed to streamline artwork preparation for DTF and DTG printing. The plug-in offers features like real-time halftones, color knockouts, and haze prevention, aiming to save time and improve print quality. Lightning Plugins offers monthly and yearly subscription plans for Lightning DTPrep.

articles.title: QCY Unveils Flagship MeloBuds N70 ANC Wireless Earbuds for A Smarter Everyday Sound Experience  Aug. 26, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: QCY has launched its flagship ANC wireless earbuds, the MeloBuds N70, featuring premium sound quality, powerful noise cancellation, and 50 hours of playtime. Priced at $59.99, the MeloBuds N70 will be available in Purple, Titanium, and Black through online channels and authorized retailers.

articles.title: Deal Alert: Amazon Slashes Price of New Kindle Colorsoft in Canada
articles.author: Iic Deals
articles.summary: Amazon's Kindle Colorsoft e-reader, featuring a 7-inch colour display optimized for colour reading and adjustable screen settings, has received its first price drop in Canada after debuting last month. The Kindle Colorsoft offers up to eight weeks of battery life and is designed to bring colour comics to life.

articles.title: 30-Year Brand Naming Veteran Brand Acumen Unveils Robust New Partnership Toolkit
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Brand Acumen launched a new website featuring a modernized brand experience, expanded portfolio access, insights into naming, and streamlined client pathways. This launch signifies the company's evolution and commitment to pushing boundaries in naming for global brands. The new website aims to provide a robust suite of tools and showcase Brand Acumen's expertise in the field.

articles.title: 30-Year Brand Naming Veteran Brand Acumen Unveils Robust New Partnership Toolkit
articles.author: Brand Acumen Studios
articles.summary: Brand Acumen launched a new website featuring a portfolio of tools and insights. This launch represents a new era for the agency, showcasing their expertise in brand naming and verbal identity. The website aims to capture the company's momentum and vision for the future of naming brands.

articles.title: 30-Year Brand Naming Veteran Brand Acumen Unveils Robust New Partnership Toolkit
articles.author: Brand Acumen Studios
articles.summary: Brand Acumen launched its new website to offer a portfolio of tools and insights. The website provides an enhanced brand experience, expanded portfolio access, perspectives on the future of naming, and streamlined client pathways. This launch signals Brand Acumen's commitment to innovate brand naming for global brands.

articles.title: Nvidia touts Jetson Thor kit for real-time robot reasoning
articles.author: Thomas Claburn
articles.summary: Nvidia has released Jetson Thor, a new brain for humanoid robots with significantly enhanced compute power and memory compared to the Jetson Orin. The Jetson Thor series features a Blackwell GPU and includes the Jetson AGX Thor Developer Kit, Jetson T5000, and Jetson T4000 modules designed for processing sensor data and AI inference with low latency.

articles.title: The new Lexus NX will be launched on August 23 and the NX200 will be launched
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Lexus will launch the NX200 on August 23. The Lexus NX series' entry-level model has been updated from the NX260.

articles.title: Shark £249 carpet cleaner that makes 'grubby carpets look brand new' now £155 on Amazon
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Shark's CarpetXpert Deep Clean Carpet Cleaner is on sale for £155.99 on Amazon, reduced from £249.99. The device includes a stain remover tool and quick-drying function, and is claimed to be eight times more effective than standard vacuum cleaners. Shark also offers CarpetXpert HairPro Pet Carpet Cleaner, now £179.99, was £279.99

articles.title: T-Mobile will give you 4 free Google Pixel phones right now - here's how the ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: T-Mobile is offering deals to new and existing customers with eligible plans and trade-ins who are upgrading to the new Google Pixel 10. The offer is likely associated with the launch of the Google Pixel 10.

articles.title: Google can translate your voice in real time now
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Google Translate has introduced a real-time translation feature, allowing users to translate spoken input in real time. Additionally, Google has launched a Duolingo-like language learning experience within the Google Translate app, powered by generative AI, providing a gamified approach to language learning. Both features are currently accessible for free to users in select countries.

articles.title: Simple washing machine addition leaves towels smelling fresh for days
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: Dr. Beckmann introduced fabric conditioner sheets available in fresh blossom and fresh breeze fragrances. These sheets, priced at £2.50, are added to the washing machine drum with detergent to impart a long-lasting fresh scent to laundry, eliminating the need for liquid fabric conditioner. The sheets are available at Sainsbury's for £3 with a Nectar card and Waitrose for £2.50.

articles.title: M&S shoppers say their 'prayers have been answered' as new items lands on shelves
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: M&S has launched a frozen version of their popular 'Colin the Caterpillar' cake, named 'Arctic Colin the Caterpillar cake'. The cake is available in M&S stores for £16.

articles.title: RedCloud and NDL to Transform Beverage Distribution Through Digital Trading  Aug. 26, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: RedCloud Holdings plc has partnered with Nigeria Distillers Limited (NDL) to sell NDL's products on RedCloud's RedAI trading platform. This partnership will enable NDL's distributors and retailers to directly access NDL's full product range, providing benefits such as a 'digital trading exchange' and improved supply chain efficiency. Retailers can source NDL's brands via the Red101 app to increase assortment with reliable supply and payment options.

articles.title: Snapchat Shares Insights into the Effectiveness of Gen AI for Marketing
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Snapchat's AI-powered Lenses are driving significantly higher rates of user attention and engagement. These AI Lenses are systematically created and effective at grabbing attention, which also leads to greater brand favorability and purchase intent. Snapchat partnered with eye square and PMG and found that AI-generated video ads, and in particular Gen AI AR Lenses, drive significantly higher rates of audience engagement.

articles.title: Microsoft Is Adding One Of The Mac's Best Tricks To Windows 11
articles.author: Joshua Hawkins
articles.summary: Microsoft is introducing a new feature to Windows 11 through its Phone Link, enabling users to seamlessly resume apps from Android phones to PCs. Initially, the feature will focus on resuming music playback on Spotify between Android devices and Windows 11 PCs, requiring the Spotify app from the Microsoft Store. This aims to improve cross-device integration within the Windows and Android ecosystem.

articles.title: General Mills Invests $54 Million in Expansion of James Ford Bell Technical Center
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: General Mills is investing $54 million to expand its James Ford Bell Technical Center by adding a 35,000-square-foot pilot plant wing. This expansion will enhance the company's research and development capabilities, empowering its teams to deliver the next generation of consumer-centric products and accelerating innovation across the company's business units.

articles.title: Wyze's Latest Cam Pan Includes 4K Resolution And Enhanced AI Features
articles.author: Amber Bouman
articles.summary: Wyze has launched the Cam Pan v4, a 4K resolution smart home security camera featuring AI-powered object tracking. The camera offers 360-degree pan and 180-degree tilt, color night vision, and is equipped with a smart chip for tracking people, pets, or vehicles. It includes features like four waypoints, a motion-activated spotlight, two-way audio, enhanced IR night vision, IP65 weather rating, privacy mode, and is available for $60.

articles.title: Local Trenton twist on McDonald's breakfast would be a huge success (L.A. PARKER COLUMN)
articles.author: L.A. Parker
articles.summary: McDonald's introduced spicy sauce to various menu items this summer. Furthermore, McDonald's is experimenting with pork roll additions to breakfast meals, like the Egg McMuffin, as a potential regional offering in the Northeast.

articles.title: Massive dust storm blankets Phoenix
articles.summary: KAGS introduced the KAGS app. The KAGS app enables users to stream KAGS content on their phones.

articles.title: The Prompting Company bets on AI as the new search engine
articles.author: Shubhangi Chowdhury
articles.summary: The Prompting Company launched Generative Experience Optimization (GEO) to help brands get noticed by AI tools like ChatGPT. The service studies user questions, creates tailored content, and formats it for AI systems, with pricing starting at $300 a month.

articles.title: This Brightening Moisturizer Is Safe For Melanin-Rich Skin
articles.author: Cierra Black
articles.summary: Eadem launched Cloud Cushion Airy Brightening Moisturizer, a new product formulated with Smart Melanin™ technology and various plant derivatives. Designed for all Fitzpatrick skin types, the moisturizer aims to even skin tone and provide deep hydration, featuring a unique 'Fufu Spoon' applicator inspired by West African culture.

articles.title: Dyson is offering an insane deal on its new WashG1 wet floor cleaner
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $200 discount on the WashG1 cordless wet vacuum cleaner during its Labor Day Sale. The WashG1 is designed to clean both wet and dry messes in a single pass using dual rollers, self-cleans with every rotation, and eliminates messy filters.

articles.title: Firm taps AI decoder to promote skin health, recommend solutions
articles.author: Iheanyi Nwachukwu
articles.summary: Nuban Beauty, a Nigerian makeup brand, has launched Nuban Care, an AI skin decoder. This AI tool analyzes skin and recommends skincare solutions, addressing issues like dehydration and hypersensitivity. The application scans skin, identifies problems, and suggests appropriate products from Nuban Beauty's existing range.

articles.title: The Best Scalp Treatments for a Happy, Healthy Scalp
articles.author: Sophie Dweck
articles.summary: Several companies, including Moroccanoil, Act+Acre, Rene Furterer, Living Proof, Philip Kingsley, Kérastase, Briogeo, Oribe, Kiehl's, and Biologique Recherche, offer scalp treatments designed to address issues such as dryness, itchiness, and product build-up. These products use various key ingredients to exfoliate, hydrate, and purify the scalp, promoting healthier hair and addressing specific scalp concerns.

articles.title: Shoppers Are Racing to Hobby Lobby to Find More of This $8 ‘Practical' and ‘Elegant' Kitchen Item
articles.author: Parade
articles.summary: Hobby Lobby is selling a new "Soap Dispenser & Sponge Holder" for $7.99. Made of ceramic, this kitchen item features a container for dish soap and a holder for the sponge, making dishwashing more civilized. Customer reviews highlight its quality, style, and functionality.

articles.title: Shoppers Are Racing to Hobby Lobby to Find More of This $8 ‘Practical' and ‘Elegant' Kitchen Item
articles.author: Parade
articles.summary: Hobby Lobby is selling a new Soap Dispenser & Sponge Holder for $7.99. The ceramic kitchen item includes a container for dish soap and a holder for the sponge, and is dishwasher and microwave safe. Customers praise its functionality, style, and quality.

articles.title: Shoppers Are Racing to Hobby Lobby to Find More of This $8 ‘Practical' and ‘Elegant' Kitchen Item
articles.author: Parade
articles.summary: Hobby Lobby is selling a "Soap Dispenser & Sponge Holder" for $7.99. This ceramic kitchen item features a designated container for dish soap and a separate holder for the sponge. Customers praise its quality, aesthetic design, and functionality, with some even purchasing multiple units.

articles.title: Shoppers Are Racing to Hobby Lobby to Find More of This $8 ‘Practical' and ‘Elegant' Kitchen Item
articles.author: Parade
articles.summary: Hobby Lobby is selling a new 'Soap Dispenser & Sponge Holder' for $7.99. The ceramic kitchen item features separate containers for dish soap and a sponge, aiming to resolve debates about sponge placement and improve kitchen organization. Customers praise the product's quality, aesthetic design, and functionality.

articles.title: If Your Birth Year Starts With '19', These 48 'Boring' Products Will Probably Excite You
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: SweatBlock introduces antiperspirant wipes for excessive sweating. Windex launches an outdoor glass cleaner attachable to a hose. Monday Haircare presents Dry Shampoo for quick hair revival. Medicube offers "Zero Pore" Pads for skin smoothing. Qualify launches chocolate brownie protein powder. Tineco introduces a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop. Bissell provides a multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner. Rael releases "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches. Gold Bond offers firming neck and chest cream. Liquid I.V. introduces hydration packets. Venus Visage offers teeth whitening pens. Elizavecca launches Collagen Coating Hair Protein Treatment.

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: The 3 best beauty products we tried this week from Guerlain, Briogeo and Lancome
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Guerlain introduces a new skincare treatment within its Abeille Royale collection, featuring crystallized spheres made with Black Bee honey. Additionally, a lightweight tinted serum with niacinamide, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E has been launched, promising buildable coverage and a 24-hour glow. The brand also offers a gloss-to-oil styling product formulated for thick hair with ingredients like Yuzu extract and plum oil.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Sale: Save Up To 65% For Labor Day Right Now
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 65% off on its top-rated mattress models.

articles.title: What Rockaway Retailers Can Learn from No-Account Digital Models
articles.author: John Sanchez
articles.summary: Rockaway Beach businesses are adopting frictionless retail solutions like mobile self-checkout apps to improve customer experience and streamline operations. These apps offer features such as personalized offers and integrated loyalty rewards, enabling customers to scan items and pay via their phones, reducing checkout lines and improving data collection on shopping behavior. Businesses are also exploring options like unified Rockaway apps and shared checkout infrastructure to enhance customer convenience and collaboration.

articles.title: Homeowners in Denver, CO Embrace Curved Glass Showers from GCS Glass & Mirror
articles.summary: GCS Glass & Mirror has introduced Curved Glass Showers in Denver, offering custom-crafted installations that transform bathrooms into luxurious retreats. These designs maximize space, enhance light, and create a relaxing atmosphere, tailored to the homeowner's style. The company also offers a range of modern shower doors to suit various tastes and budgets.

articles.title: Humanize AI Transforms AI-Generated Text
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Toolsmart introduces Humanize AI, a service designed to transform AI-generated text into more natural, human-like writing. Humanize AI offers nine distinct modes to tailor the tone and style of text and offers customizable humanize levels.

articles.title: Google Brings AI Mode To Pakistan, Its Most Powerful
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Google launched AI Mode in Pakistan in English. Powered by Gemini 2.5, this AI-powered Search experience enables users to ask complex questions and receive comprehensive answers. AI Mode is now live in Pakistan on the Google App (Android and iOS), and on both mobile and desktop web.

articles.title: The Hasselblad X2D II 100C: The Latest Release Breaks Boundaries
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Hasselblad announced the X2D II 100C. X2D II 100C is the next evolution of Hasselblad's mirrorless medium format system.

articles.title: Why Nio Stock Skyrocketed Again Today
articles.author: Howard Smith
articles.summary: Nio's stock is surging due to the release of its new ES8 flagship SUV, priced lower with a Battery-as-a-Service (BaaS) subscription. The ES8 model is being offered for approximately $43,000 including the battery subscription. Nio is expanding its battery swap station network.

articles.title: Menkair Is Redefining Mens Wellness: The Brand Turning Taboo Into Confidence
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Menkair, a new personal care brand, has launched a range of intimate hygiene products for men, including Nutz Wash, Nutz Fresh Spray, Fresh Nutz Cologne, and Smooth Nutz Cream. These products are designed for everyday comfort, helping with sweat, odor, and chafing while being gentle on the skin. The brand aims to normalize men's self-care and promote open conversations around men's hygiene and well-being.

articles.title: Pumpkin spice lattes are back. Take a look at Starbucks fall menu
articles.author: Knox News
articles.summary: Starbucks launched its 'Green Apron Service' nationwide, focusing on speed, personalization, and hospitality across its stores. Additionally, Starbucks launched its fall menu on August 26th, featuring returning favorite products.

articles.title: Focus On Pasta & Pasta Sauces: 4 October
articles.author: Emma Weinbren
articles.summary: One pasta brand is expanding its product line with premium orzo, bucatini, and tubetti lines. Another brand recently launched a range of Italian-inspired breakfast pasta products.

articles.title: The very best of Northern Irish-made artisanal produce handpicked 'to land on Lidl shelves across our 43 stores'
articles.author: Claire Cartmill
org: Northern Ireland Food and Drink Association
articles.summary: Lidl Northern Ireland launched over 30 new products from more than 17 local producers in its stores on September 11, as part of the Kickstart Supplier Development Programme. These products include items from companies like SleepSound (Pillow Spray), Dukes (Ultra-Premium Ice Cream), and Steeper Culture (Kombucha and Sparkling Tea), offering customers a diverse range of locally made goods. Lidl has invested over £4 million in the Kickstart program, supporting local producers in scaling up and reaching new customer audiences.

articles.title: Project Moohan could have a serious gaming advantage over Apple Vision Pro
articles.summary: Samsung is considering expanding its cloud gaming technology, currently available on Galaxy phones, to other devices like the Project Moohan XR headset, TVs, and even refrigerators. The company envisions a future where content is ubiquitously accessible across all screens. Their mobile cloud gaming platform is now available in the Samsung Gaming Hub on supported Galaxy devices in the UK and Germany, and was rolled out in the US almost a year ago as a beta test.

articles.title: OMN Leads AI-Powered Revolution in SEO and Marketing Solutions
articles.author: OMN
articles.summary: OMN has launched new AI-driven marketing solutions designed to assist businesses in Switzerland. These tools aim to streamline operations, enhance customer connections, and improve marketing strategies through advanced analytics. The solutions are customizable for businesses of all sizes and provide insights into customer behavior to drive strategic growth.

articles.title: Dyson's 360 Vis Nav, our favorite robot vacuum for carpets, is half off
articles.author: Sheena Vasani
articles.summary: Dyson's 360 Vis Nav robot vacuum, known for its powerful 65 air watts suction and suitability for carpets, features a long, fluffy roller brush for effective debris and dust pickup. Its square body allows it to reach corners and edges. Currently available at a discounted price of $499 at Amazon, Target, and Dyson.

articles.title: The best hair dryers for smooth, speedy styling at home – whatever your hair type
articles.author: Sarah Matthews
articles.summary: The article reviews several hair dryers from brands like Hershesons, BaByliss, Panasonic, and Head Jog. Hershesons the Great hair dryer has four speeds, three heat settings and a cool shot and Head Jog Futaria hair dryer packs a serious punch, rough-drying hair quickly.

articles.title: MG ZS EV – Practical, Efficient, and Built for Daily Life
articles.summary: MG Motor announced a limited-period price cut for the ZS EV, with the top-spec Essence trim becoming more affordable by Rs 4.44 lakh, bringing its price down to Rs 20.50 lakh. This price revision makes the fully loaded variant an outstanding value-for-money proposition with features such as a panoramic sunroof and advanced safety tech.

articles.title: Apple iPhone 17 Pro may get new Liquid Silicone cases in 8 fresh colours
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Apple might release new Liquid Silicone cases for the iPhone Pro. These cases could come in fresh, updated colors, adding a new aesthetic option for iPhone Pro users.

articles.title: Meet the teen innovator behind Paraspeak, the Rs 2,000 AI device for slurred speech
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: A teen innovator has created "Paraspeak," an AI device to help people who suffer from slurred speech.

articles.title: Lidl launches new range of Irish-made artisan products under Kickstart scheme
articles.summary: Lidl is launching 46 new products from 24 Irish producers next month through its Kickstart Supplier Development Programme. These products, including items from Big Pot Co, Dukes Ice Cream, Ardmore Treats, Jackson Roze, McKee Foods, and Comuna Coffee, will be available in Lidl stores from September 11. The Kickstart program provides support to local agri-food producers, showcasing their products to Lidl customers.

articles.title: Starbucks PSL returns today, but is Starbucks bringing back the Apple Crisp? What to know
articles.author: El Paso Times
articles.summary: Starbucks launched its 'Green Apron Service' initiative nationwide. This service aims to improve speed, personalization, and hospitality across 11,000 Starbucks stores. Additionally, Starbucks launched a "White Cable Knit Tumbler."

articles.title: Advisor CRM Launches Gen AI Marketing Suite to Help Financial Advisors Deepen Client Engagement and Win Back Time
articles.author: Advisor CRM
articles.summary: The company is launching Gen AI Marketing Suite that uses AI to streamline marketing content creation, ensuring brand consistency. Key features include AI-powered email creation with tone and subject line suggestions, and authenticity at scale.

articles.title: Swiggy's own snacks and beverages are now available on Instamart
articles.summary: Swiggy's subsidiary, Scootsy Logistics, has launched a private-label food brand called Noice on Instamart. Noice offers over 200 small-batch snacks and beverages across 13 categories in multiple cities in India. The brand aims to provide authentic homestyle recipes and healthier packaged food options by partnering with local kitchens and manufacturers.

articles.title: Qualified Unveils The World's First AI SDR Superagent
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Qualified introduced new capabilities for Piper, their AI sales development representative (SDR) agent, turning it into a full-funnel AI SDR superagent. Piper now features multi-modal functionality (text, voice, video), multi-stage management, and multi-channel engagements to autonomously manage the entire sales funnel. These expanded capabilities elevate Piper from qualifying buyers to full-funnel pipeline management and nurturing.

articles.title: Aurasell launches as the world's first AI-native CRM platform
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: Aurasell launched the world's first AI-native CRM platform. The platform is a full-featured GTM solution built for the agentic era in business software.

articles.title: PrimeBook 2 Neo review: This Android laptop under ₹16,000 is better than a tablet?
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: PrimeBook introduced the PrimeBook 2 Neo, an affordable AI-ready laptop for Indian users, priced at ₹15,990. This laptop aims to offer Android familiarity, AI smarts, and cloud-driven functionality.

articles.title: M&S launches Colin the Caterpillar cake with big difference – but it'll cost you
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) has launched a new product called 'Arctic Colin the Caterpillar,' a frozen version of their popular chocolate cake. The product is a Belgian chocolate log with chocolate sauce and sponge, adorned with chocolate ganache and sugar-coated milk chocolate beans and is priced at £16. Initial reactions are mixed, with some customers balking at the price.

articles.title: Wype raises £1m to clean up in ‘bottom care'
articles.author: Ed Devlin
articles.summary: Wype, a company selling a refillable cleansing gel that transforms toilet paper into wet wipes, secured a seven-figure funding round. The company's revenue has increased 15-fold since 2022, reaching an annualised run rate of £4.5m this year, demonstrating success after appearing on BBC's Dragons' Den.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord Buds 3r Wireless Earbuds Launched In India With AI Noise Cancellation; Check Features And Special Launch Price
articles.author: Ankur Mishra
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its new Nord Buds 3r wireless earbuds in India, featuring 12.4mm titanium drivers, AI-powered noise cancellation, and an IP55 rating. Priced at Rs 1,799 (with a launch day offer of Rs 1,599), they offer up to 54 hours of playtime and will be available starting September 8 on OnePlus's website, Amazon, Flipkart, and other retailers.

articles.title: Loftie Clock review: I swapped my phone for this smart alarm clock
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: The Loftie alarm clock offers a two-phase alarm system with dozens of gentle melodies for a softer wake-up experience, automatically fading after 30 seconds. A second phase uses a calm chime. Users can customize features and sounds, including nature-inspired options, on the clock or via the Loftie app.

articles.title: Blaupunkt launches Mini LED smart TVs in India, price starts at Rs 94,999
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Blaupunkt has launched its new Google-powered Mini LED televisions in India, entering the premium smart TV category. The company announced two models, available in 65-inch and 75-inch screen sizes.

articles.title: Food retailer and hydroponic leafy greens grower start partnership
articles.summary: Giant Food has partnered with BrightFarms to launch a new line of ready-to-eat greens under Giant Food's private-label Nature's Promise brand. The new Greenhouse Grown lineup includes Sweet Baby Butter, Green and Red Leaf, and Spring Mix varieties. These greens are grown in high-tech, climate-controlled greenhouses and delivered to stores quickly, requiring no washing.

articles.title: Screwfix's gadget cleans windows in seconds & leaves them streak-free – it removes condensation in winter too
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Karcher's WV1 Cordless Window Vacuum (£39.99) offers streak-free cleaning for glass and tiles. Aldi has reintroduced its Cyclonic Stick Vacuum (£39.99) with powerful suction and various attachments. Lidl is selling the Tower Cordless Window Cleaner for £19.99, promising shiny windows and condensation removal with a rechargeable battery.

articles.title: Galbot to Accelerate Robotics with NVIDIA Jetson Thor
articles.author: Beijing Galbot Co.
articles.summary: Galbot is integrating NVIDIA Jetson AGX Thor into its G1 Premium robot. This enhancement will improve autonomy for deployment in retail, healthcare, and logistics. The G1 Premium robot was recently showcased at the World Robotics Conference.

articles.title: Zinrelo and TINT Merge to Form TrueLoyal
articles.author: Zinrelo
articles.summary: Zinrelo and TINT merged to create TrueLoyal. TrueLoyal is a loyalty platform for multi-channel consumer brands. The platform features predictive, generative, and assistive AI.

articles.title: Sweed Launches AI-Powered Customer Display That Turns Dispensary Checkouts into Revenue-Driving ...
articles.author: Sweed
articles.summary: Sweed launched its new AI-powered Customer Facing Display, designed to transform static checkout moments into dynamic growth opportunities for dispensaries. The interface empowers shoppers to browse and manage their orders while enabling budtenders to provide real-time guidance and recommendations.

articles.title: Not Just for Dogs: Four Paws Introduces Wee-Wee® Pads Especially for Cats
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Four Paws is expanding its Wee-Wee product line with Wee-Wee Cat Pads, designed to neutralize cat urine odors. The pads, available in two varieties for litter box systems and under standard litter boxes, feature Advanced Odor Control technology. They are available at Amazon, Chewy, and Walmart.com.

articles.title: 30 Problem-Solving Products That'll Actually Work
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Revlon introduced a volcanic face roller for oil absorption. The Pink Stuff launched a cleaning paste effective on grease, marker, and grime. Affresh released dishwasher cleaner tablets for machine maintenance. Aquaphor promotes a healing ointment for dry skin. Bio-Oil presents an oil blend to reduce stretch marks.

articles.title: Wyze's newest pan and tilt cam can track your pets in 4K
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Wyze has launched its first 4K security camera, the Wyze Cam Pan v4, for $60. The new camera includes color night vision, pan and tilt, AI-powered object tracking, a motion-activated spotlight, and improved two-way audio, with compatibility for smart home integrations via Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.

articles.title: Hands-on with the Level Lock Pro: sleeker, smarter, still very expensive
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Level has launched the Level Lock Pro, a smart lock with a discreet design and enhanced features. The Level Lock Pro includes a faster chip, a built-in door sensor, presence detection, and improved battery life. It supports Matter, enabling compatibility with various smart home ecosystems, and can be controlled via multiple methods, including a regular key, Apple Home Key, and an app.

articles.title: Wyze Launches First 4K Resolution Camera with Cam Pan v4
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Wyze launched Wyze Cam Pan v4. Wyze Cam Pan v4 is the brand's first-ever 4K security camera powered by a new smart chip that enables AI-powered object tracking and features ultra HD resolution with person, pet, and vehicle tracking.

articles.title: Samsung's ultra-fast 990 EVO Plus SSD just hit a new lowest price
articles.author: Viviane Osswald
articles.summary: The Samsung 990 EVO Plus (1TB) NVMe M.2 SSD is currently available on Amazon for $64.99, a 38% discount from its original price of $104.99. The SSD has a rating of 4.8 out of 5 stars with over 6,000 reviews and over 10,000 orders in the last month.

articles.title: NVIDIA's Jetson Thor Powers Real-Time Reasoning in Robotics and Physical AI with Cutting-Edge AI Capabilities
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nvidia launched Jetson Thor, a new robotics computer featuring enhanced AI processing power, CPU performance, and memory compared to its predecessor, Jetson Orin. Agility Robotics plans to integrate Jetson Thor into their sixth-generation Digit robot to enhance real-time perception, and Boston Dynamics will use it in their Atlas robot. The Nvidia Jetson AGX Thor developer kit is available for purchase now.

articles.title: How to Keep Your Sneakers Looking Brand New
articles.author: Odunmorayo Ayobami
articles.summary: Sneaklin provides Sneaker Cleaning Wipes designed for quick clean-ups of sneakers. Adidas re-released Sambas in 1972, designed as football boots, and the design continues to dominate the fashion scene. PUMA Scend Pro running shoes are for performance and comfort with breathable mesh.

articles.title: NVMe VPS - Super fast virtual servers from Deltahost
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Windows introduces NVMe VPS plans with varying configurations, catering to different user needs. These plans range from WINDOWS-4 with 2x Xeon CPU, 4 GB RAM, and 100 GB NVMe storage for remote desktop or trading purposes, priced at $23/month, to higher tiers suitable for small offices.

articles.title: GoDaddy Packs 2025 With AI Upgrades
articles.author: Go Daddy Inc
articles.summary: GoDaddy rolled out a broad range of new AI-charged features in the first half of 2025. These updates aim to simplify online business management and make getting online and selling easier for small businesses. The improvements are based on direct customer feedback.

articles.title: RedCloud and NDL to Transform Beverage Distribution Through Digital Trading
articles.author: Red Cloud Holdings plc
articles.summary: RedCloud Holdings plc and Nigeria Distillers Limited (NDL) have formed a strategic partnership. NDL will now sell its products on RedCloud's RedAI trading platform, providing access to its full product range for distributors and retailers. Retailers can also source NDL brands via the Red101 app.

articles.title: Ninja Luxe Cafe Premier Espresso Machine review: It's not perfect but I still love this coffee maker for beginner baristas
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Luxe Cafe Premier espresso machine in 2024, featuring Barista Assist and automatic milk frothing. Reviewers found the machine delivers excellent espresso, automatic milk frothing, and is easy to clean, and offers good value for beginner users looking for a feature-rich coffee experience.

articles.title: Tech war: Kylin upgrades operating system with AI, support for Chinese semiconductors
articles.author: Ben Jiang
articles.summary: Kylin Software launched V11, the latest version of its operating system. The new OS features AI capabilities and extensive support for locally designed semiconductors. V11 delivers expanded compatibility with Chinese-designed integrated circuits.

articles.title: Perfect Corp. Announces 2025 Global Beauty & Fashion AI Forum in New York City
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. is launching new AI-powered beauty and fashion tech solutions, showcased at the Global Beauty & Fashion AI Forum on September 16, 2025. The new products include Generative AI full-body fashion try-on, Perfect Beauty Agent (AI-powered virtual consultant), and HD Skin Analysis and 3D Face Support, designed to enhance customer experience with hyper-personalized shopping journeys.

articles.title: Hasselblad's new medium format flagship comes with end-to-end HDR
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Hasselblad has launched the X2D II 100C, a medium format camera with true HDR photo capabilities and a brighter OLED touchscreen. It features LiDAR-assisted autofocus, 10-stop in-body stabilization, and costs $7,399.

articles.title: From disruption to opportunity: How AI is helping brands pivot faster, smarter, and cheaper
articles.author: Michael Dunn
articles.summary: Colgate-Palmolive utilizes generative AI to accelerate product development by identifying consumer needs and generating product concepts, significantly reducing the time required for research and refinement. Commonwealth Bank of Australia employs a new AI platform to handle internal queries from staff, improving customer service efficiency and reducing costs. Chipotle has introduced Ava Cado, a conversational AI assistant, to streamline its hiring process, decreasing the time-to-hire and enabling the onboarding of a large number of employees rapidly.

articles.title: Dreame FoamWash H15 Pro: Pet Hair & Odor Removal
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched the H15 Pro FoamWash and H15S vacuum cleaners, showcasing advancements in home cleaning technology. The H15 Pro FoamWash utilizes a three-step cleaning process with foam and enzymatic action for targeted cleaning, while the H15S focuses on edge and corner cleaning with a 'gapfree ai descendreach robotic arm'. Both models emphasize self-cleaning features like 100°C hot water cleaning and tangle-resistant blades to reduce maintenance.

articles.title: ‘Hollow Knight: Silksong' September release date is delaying other games
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Hollow Knight: Silksong is launching next month. Other game developers are delaying their titles to avoid competition with the launch of the game.

articles.title: HPE Accelerates Self-driving Network Operations With New Mist Agentic AI-native Innovations
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: HPE introduced innovations to its HPE Juniper Networking portfolio, enhancing its AI-native Mist platform with agentic AIOps for autonomous network operations. These enhancements include AI-powered troubleshooting, expanded control of self-driving actions, a generalized Large Experience Model (LEM), and new AIOps features for data centers.

articles.title: Suntory Unveils Lucozade Cola in the Market
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Suntory has launched Lucozade Cola. This new product is now available in the market.

articles.title: 32 Affordable Beauty Swaps For More Expensive Products That Are So High Quality You'll Buy Them Once And Stick With Them Forever
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Numerous companies have launched or introduced a variety of beauty and personal care products, including Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Clinique tinted lip balm, Lottabody's Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, Kuumba Made Creamy Coconut fragrance rollerball, Hawaiian Tropic's SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush, Sally Hansen Insta-Dri nail polish, E.l.f. Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm and Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener and Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Olay's Firming Body Lotion, Mise En Scene Perfect Serum, E.l.f.'s Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, Wild Iris Musk Body Wash, Maybelline Superfluff Volumizing Brow Mousse, Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, Jergens Natural Glow Firming Self Tanner Body Lotion, "Glow Up!" Vitamin C Face Serum, Eos' Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion, MagicMinerals AirBrush Foundation, Differin Acne Treatment Gel, Essence's Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops,  Physicians Formula Butter Glow & Go Stick, Nyx matte setting spray and Briotech spray. These products span various categories, such as skincare, haircare, makeup, and sun protection, often positioned as affordable alternatives to higher-priced competitors.

articles.title: Most AI Projects Fail—Here Are Four Ways To Beat The Odds
articles.author: Gautam Lohia
articles.summary: Apply Digital developed the TasteMaker platform, an AI-powered tool, for Kraft Heinz to reduce content production time. The tool enabled content production in hours instead of weeks and has a high adoption rate due to its usability and relevance.

articles.title: DAX Hair Care Launches New Packaging and Website
articles.author: Imperial DAX Co.
articles.summary: Imperial DAX Co., Inc. has launched new packaging for its DAX Classic jar products. The company also revamped its daxhaircare.com website. These visual changes are the first in roughly eight years.

articles.title: LG CNS unveils enterprise AI platforms that enhance work productivity
articles.author: 일본 전국 여행 정보
articles.summary: LG CNS introduced AgenticWorks, an enterprise AI platform, and AXthink, a business innovation service for automating routine tasks. AgenticWorks is a modular platform supporting the entire AI service lifecycle, while AXthink analyzes user work styles to provide personalized features. At LG Display, AXthink improved productivity by 10% and saved over $10 billion annually.

articles.title: ZJLD Group Announces Interim Results for FY2025
articles.summary: ZJLD Group is upgrading its product matrix with the launch of 'Da Zhen' baijiu, a premium product embodying cultural heritage. Simultaneously, the company is venturing into new categories with 'News Craft Beer', a product designed with youthful appeal. These product launches are integral to ZJLD's brand revitalization and market expansion strategy.

articles.title: Cadent Positioned as the Leader in the SPARK Matrix™: AdTech Platform, 2025 by QKS Group
articles.author: QKS Group
articles.summary: Cadent has been recognized as a leader in the 2025 SPARK Matrix™: AdTech Platform. Cadent has restructured its platform to unify DSP, SSP, and analytics layers under a single interface, embedding AI logic directly into campaign configuration. The platform streamlines audience activation by integrating first-party onboarding, predictive trait enhancement, and real-time segment analysis into a single workflow.

articles.title: Are these 'crush-proof' Bluetooth speakers legit? I took them into the wild, and here's my verdict
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Turtlebox offers two rugged Bluetooth speakers designed for adventurous lifestyles.

articles.title: Best high speed portable SSDs set the bar for portable storage with blazing fast read and write speeds
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares several high-speed portable SSDs, including the SanDisk Extreme, Samsung T7 and T9, Crucial X10 Pro, Kingston XS1000, and Amazon Basics models. It highlights their read/write speeds, encryption features, compatibility, and design, offering insights for professionals and general users seeking fast and reliable portable storage solutions and describes their speeds and features.

articles.title: Cordless Dyson vacuum that is 'great for spider nabbing' drops to £99 in online deal
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Wowcher is offering a 48% discount on the refurbished Dyson V6 Cordless Handstick Vacuum, bringing the price down to £99. Amazon is selling the Dyson V8 Advanced Cordless Stick Vacuum with a discount, priced at £206.10. The Dyson V6 features a V6 motor, pet tool, crevice nozzle, dusting brush, and upholstery tools.

articles.title: AgileTV powers new Lowi TV launch in Spain
articles.author: Robert Briel
articles.summary: AgileTV developed the TV platform for Lowi's launch of its first television service, Lowi TV, in Spain. This service offers 114 channels, including premium brands and a Sports Pack. Lowi TV customers can use features such as VOD, Startover, CatchUp, and Recordings on devices like LG and Samsung smart TVs.

articles.title: Smarter, Sharper & More Stylish Than Ever
articles.summary: Renault is launching the 2025 Kiger with a refreshed design and smarter features. The compact SUV aims to provide improved value with exterior tweaks, upgraded interiors, and advanced tech for convenience, as well as enhanced ride comfort and performance.

articles.title: Hoora's ₹9 Car Wash Offer Sparks Scam Outcry
articles.author: Nagpur News
articles.summary: Hoora, a car wash app, launched a promotional offer of a ₹9 car wash on Tuesdays. Customers reported that the offer was not available on the app and experienced issues such as booking cancellations, wallet-only refunds, and inconsistent service quality. The company's response to inquiries regarding the promotional offer and service issues has deepened customer mistrust.

articles.title: A Fall River Restaurant Is Taking Customer Service to the Next Level With A.I.
articles.author: Gazelle Gazelle Published:
articles.summary: Tipsy Toboggan restaurant has introduced an AI service to handle customer calls and reservations. The AI smoothly manages reservation updates, leaving the caller impressed by the futuristic technology.

articles.title: Apple expands its footprint in India, tech giant to open its new store in..., launch to take place on...
articles.author: Apurwa Amit
articles.summary: Apple is expanding its presence in a country, offering customers new ways to explore and purchase Apple products. The expansion includes providing in-person exceptional service.

articles.title: Bosch Powers Mobility Shift with Software-Defined Vehicles
articles.summary: Bosch is developing software-defined vehicles (SDV) with Vehicle Motion Management (VMM) for enhanced safety and control. They offer AI-powered Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) that learn from real-world data, and cloud-based solutions like Battery in the Cloud, Cloud-Based Wrong-Way Driver Warning, and RideCare for Fleet Management to improve vehicle safety, efficiency, and user experience.

articles.title: This $300 water bottle wants to make luxury hydration a thing
articles.author: Zachary Petit
articles.summary: Hardy Steinmann soft-launched the Okapa water bottle earlier this year, which is a luxury bottle with a price of $295. The Okapa bottle consists of eight modular pieces, all recyclable, and can be quickly disassembled for cleaning, and features an inner titanium pin and a hinge that springs open at the push of a button.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 vs. Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold
articles.author: Mashable
articles.summary: Samsung is developing an ultra-thin foldable device. This foldable is being positioned as a competitor to Google's newest flagship product.

articles.title: Amazon could be bringing huge Android upgrade to its Fire tablet range
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Amazon is reportedly considering launching a new, higher-end Fire tablet that will run the full Android operating system, including the Google Play Store, for the first time. This new tablet, potentially priced around $400, would allow users to download Google apps and could signal a shift for Amazon to challenge Apple and Samsung in the broader tablet market.

articles.title: Build a Unique & Trusted Brand
articles.author: General Editor
articles.summary: ThrivePop offers complete branding packages that include brand strategy, naming, logo design, color palette & typography, brand voice, packaging design, website branding, and social media branding. These services help businesses define their brand, design a visual identity, develop a voice, design packaging, build a website, and maintain consistency.

articles.title: Reviewers Over 50 Love These 29 Products And, Yes, You Probably Will Too
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new products including a teeth-whitening pen, a tightening cream infused with caffeine, coconut oil, and guarana extract, and compression gloves designed to relieve joint pain. Additionally, a 'flossing toothbrush' with advanced bristles and Levi's pull-on skinny jeans for comfortable denim wear are featured, along with Embryolisse moisturizing cream and anti-humidity spray that creates a waterproof coat around your hair.

articles.title: Your Ultimate Guide To Lipsticks That Suit Dusky To Fair Skin Tone
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Maybelline New York launched Sensational Lipstick with a creamy matte texture. Miss Claire introduced Soft Matte Lip Cream, a hydrating, velvety lip product. L'Oreal Paris launched Chiffon Signature Lipstick, featuring a feather-light mousse texture. Milani launched Color Fetish Matte Lipstick which is enriched with hyaluronic acid. All lipsticks are available on Myntra.

articles.title: OnePlus launches its most affordable Nord Buds 3r earphones in India: Check price, specs
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its new affordable true wireless earbuds, the OnePlus Nord Buds 3r, in India. The earbuds feature an IP55 rating, 12.4mm dynamic drivers, AI-powered call noise cancellation, and promise up to 54 hours of battery life. They are available at a launch price of Rs 1,799 and will go on sale from September 8, 2025.

articles.title: How is Superside using AI?
articles.author: Rob Alderson
articles.summary: Superside is integrating AI into its design, branding, and creative services. They offer clients the option to use AI in their projects, employing tools like Krea, Leonardo AI, Runway, and Visual Electric. Superside has also implemented AI-driven systems for design operations, image manipulation, and visual exploration to improve efficiency and workflows.

articles.title: Apple to open fourth India store in Pune on Sept 4
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Apple is significantly expanding its presence in Pune, India. This expansion offers customers new ways to explore and purchase Apple products. Customers can also experience Apple's services in person.

articles.title: Next-Gen Kia Seltos to Feature Aggressive New Look and Futuristic Cabin
articles.author: Asianet Newsable English
articles.summary: Kia India is set to introduce the next-generation Kia Seltos SUV, featuring a redesigned exterior with a boxy silhouette, new LED DRLs, and updated headlights. The interior boasts a trinity panoramic display system with a 12.3-inch infotainment screen and digital instrument cluster, along with upgraded safety features like Level-2 ADAS and six airbags. The new Kia Seltos is expected to be released in November 2025.

articles.title: Samsung makes fun of Apple before iPhone 17 launch because…
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, marking the seventh generation of its foldable phones. These new models feature refined designs and enhanced features, contributing to the company's increased popularity.

articles.title: Top newly launched TVs from Sony, LG, Samsung and more are now available with up to 60% off
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Sony has launched the BRAVIA 5 Series 4K Ultra HD Smart Mini LED Google TVs in 85-inch and 65-inch sizes with features like XR Processor, Dolby Atmos sound, and Google TV integration. Acerpure has released the 65-inch Elevate Series Ultra HD 4K QLED Smart Google TV with HDR10 and DTS Studio Sound. Other new TV models include LG's 50-inch UA82 Series, Xiaomi's 32-inch A Pro QLED Series Smart TV, Vu's Vibe Series 50VIBE-DV, Samsung's Crystal 4K TV, Hisense's 65-inch E6N Series, and several other Sony and Samsung models, all featuring various screen sizes, resolutions, smart features, and audio technologies.

articles.title: விரைவில் வெளியாகும் மாருதியின் புதிய எஸ்யூவி.. என்ன கார் அது?
articles.summary: Maruti is launching a new SUV next week.

articles.title: Infamous durian fruit hits New Zealand supermarkets
articles.author: Lisa Owen of
articles.summary: Peter Pan, a durian importer, introduced durian to Foodstuffs supermarkets this month after initial rejection. Foodstuffs is now selling durian in New Zealand supermarkets, with Peter Pan noting that the fruit sells out quickly. Peter Pan tried to introduce the fruit to Foodstuffs almost 20 years ago.

articles.title: Diageo Korea, a premium liquor company, announced on the 26th that Johnny Walker, a Scotch whisky br..
articles.author: Choi Ki-Sung
articles.summary: Diageo Korea's Johnny Walker was recognized as the world's No. 1 Scotch whisky by Euromonitor International. Johnny Walker introduced Johnny Walker Black Ruby, reinterpreted by the brand's first female master blender, and Johnny Walker Blonde, the first whiskey developed for Mixology, targeting consumers who enjoy high balls and cocktails. They have also launched limited edition products, like the "Johnny Walker Black Squid Game Edition" and "Johnny Walker Blue 12 magazine Edition."

articles.title: Save $30 on the New Kindle Colorsoft for a Limited Time!
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on its newly released 16GB Kindle Colorsoft and Colorsoft Kids e-readers, priced at $219.99 and $239.99 respectively. The Colorsoft features a seven-inch color E Ink display, IPX8 waterproofing, and up to eight weeks of battery life, while the Kids version includes a 12-month Amazon Kids Plus subscription and extended warranty.

articles.title: Samsung makes fun of Apple before iPhone 17 launch because…
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and released an ad highlighting the phone's foldable advantage over Apple's iPhone. The ad mocks Apple for not having a foldable phone and Samsung is rumored to launch a tri-fold phone in the coming months.

articles.title: Future is now: 10 AI tools making life easier
articles.summary: MidJourney is a generative AI tool. It creates digital art and designs from text prompts. This tool assists artists, designers, and marketers in realizing creative concepts with distinctive visuals.

articles.title: Opening date for Starbucks drive-thru near the new Sainsbury's superstore could be on the horizon
articles.author: The Editor
articles.summary: Starbucks is expected to open a new drive-thru location in Alsager next month (September). The drive-thru is located on the former Twyford Bathrooms site off Linley Lane, on part of the Sainsbury's land, and its opening hours are planned to be from 6 am to 11 pm, consistent with the Sainsbury's store hours.

articles.title: Synthetic data cuts costs and time
articles.author: Phong Quach
articles.summary: AI is enabling the creation of synthetic data for various applications, including AI-powered persona bots for retail banking and synthetic experts for professional service companies. This technology is also being utilized in product testing, where AI supplements real-world data to enhance research and development.

articles.title: LG Electronics to Launch AI Home Platform in Europe Next Month
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its upgraded AI home platform, LG ThinQ AI, in Europe. The platform includes ThinQ UP, allowing software-based upgrades to appliances, and ThinQ Care, which monitors appliance usage and potential malfunctions. New features will be tailored for specific European markets, such as Fresh Keeper in Spain and AI Saving Mode in Germany and France.

articles.title: Neel Pandya's Dual Wave: Revolutionizing Marketing with AI and Climate Tech
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Climaty AI, led by Neel Pandya, has launched a platform integrating climate responsibility with media strategies. The platform includes features like Cross-Media Carbon Intelligence and Agentic AI Suite. It aims to be the default climate layer for media decisions, launching across APAC, GCC, EU, UK, and North America.

articles.title: Coffee Project unveils a fresh look and new flavors
articles.author: MBrand
articles.summary: Coffee Project launched the 'Experience the New' campaign, introducing new drinks like Golden Maple and food options like Continental Lite Breakfast. The campaign also includes refreshed cafe interiors and community events, accompanied by a customer-first pricing approach that remakes drinks to meet guest expectations.

articles.title: Beauty fans turn to AI-customised foundation for 'perfect' skin tone match
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: DCYPHER has launched My Custom Foundation, an AI-customized foundation that creates products tailored to individual skin tones. Customers have their faces scanned and choose coverage and finish options, resulting in a personalized, hydrating foundation priced at £39. The product line also includes My Custom Concealer, My Custom Drops, Blur Balance Primer and Luminous Light Primer.

articles.title: GoPro's app gets major new update, featuring new Mural mode, highlight reels and easier browsing
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: GoPro has unveiled updates to its smartphone app. These updates aim to enhance usability and introduce more features.

articles.title: WhatsApp introduces Carts to help make in-app purchases more straightforward
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: WhatsApp is launching a new "shopping cart feature." This feature allows users to order multiple items from businesses via a simple message, enhancing the shopping experience.

articles.title: Suntory unveils new Lucozade Cola
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
org: Suntory Beverage and Food Nigeria Limited
articles.summary: Suntory has introduced a new Lucozade variant called Lucozade Cola. Boma Harrison, Head of Marketing & Trade Marketing at Suntory Beverage and Food Nigeria Limited (SBFN), announced the product launch at a media event in Lagos. The new product is designed to meet the evolving needs of consumers.

articles.title: Just 34 Products For Those Body Things You'd Rather Google Than Speak Aloud
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Several new personal hygiene and skincare products have been introduced. This includes travel-ready deodorant wipes featuring an aluminum-free formula, Nizoral anti-dandruff shampoo to combat itchy scalps and dandruff, and an anti-chafe balm designed to protect skin from rubbing. Additionally, Veet's sensitive hair removal gel is now available, along with a deodorizer shoe spray to eliminate odors.

articles.title: Top 4 Must-Have Serums For Glowing Skin You Can Grab From Myntra Today
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra is offering four serums based on different skin concerns: Lakmé Radiance Serum for brightness, Plum Mandarin Serum for hydration, Minimalist Niacinamide Serum for texture correction, and Deyga Beautifying Serum for overnight revival. Each serum contains key features and targets different skin types and preferences.

articles.title: 35 Amazon Finds Approved By TikTokers And Reviewers
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Dr Teals launched a limited edition "Hawaiian Bliss" Epsom salt magnesium soak. Anua introduced a heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil. Catrice released an "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash. Balmuda introduced a toaster known for cooking the perfect piece of toast. Mise En Scene launched Perfect Serum for hair. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream.

articles.title: 31 Effective Products You Need If You Love A Bargain
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article features a variety of affordable new beauty and household products. New products include E.l.f.'s lip balm and Power Grip Primer, Wet n Wild lipstick and tinted hydrator, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Essence mascara, and Kiss press-on nails and nail glue. The Dash single-serve ice cream maker is also presented as a compact alternative to the Ninja Creami.

articles.title: New Software 'LaunchJack Dominator' Makes Launch Jacking Easier, Faster, and More Profitable
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: LaunchJack Dominator has officially launched, aiming to simplify and improve the profitability of launch jacking for online marketers and affiliates. The product intends to address the challenges affiliates face in the speed and workload involved in profiting from product launches.

articles.title: Nvidia touts Jetson Thor kit for real-time robot reasoning
articles.author: The Register
articles.summary: Nvidia released Jetson Thor, a new GPU module for humanoid robots designed for AI and robotics. Jetson Thor offers increased compute power and memory compared to Nvidia's prior offerings.

articles.title: Scouted: I Traveled to Oregon With Aveda—And Came Home With Shinier Hair
articles.summary: Aveda launched Miraculous Oil High Shine Hair Concentrate. The new hair oil contains daikon seed oil and Tsubaki seed oil, and it delivers 195 percent more shine instantly and creates hair that's two times smoother. The oil is vegan, cruelty-free, silicone-free, and made with 100 percent post-consumer recycled packaging.

articles.title: Philips Norelco launches Head Shaver Pro series, featuring elevated comfort and precision
articles.author: Williston Observer
articles.summary: The leading electric shave brand introduces its blade technology to a new grooming category. This expansion aims to deliver a smoother, more personalized headshave experience to consumers.

articles.title: Nvidia launches its Jetson AGX Thor robotics chip developer kit
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the Jetson AGX Thor, a $3,499 robotics module developer kit, designed to enable customers to create robots. Nvidia plans to start shipping the first developer kits next month for prototyping.

articles.title: 'Lovely' �30 Next dress looks 'sophisticated' and 'flattering on tummy'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A retailer is introducing a 'smart jersey' dress. The dress is promoted as offering style and comfort with an elegant and flattering silhouette.

articles.title: ProStar SEO Unveils Cutting-Edge LLM SEO Services
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: ProStar SEO introduced Revolutionary LLM SEO Services. This service aims to transform digital marketing.

articles.title: Wyze Hits 4K With New $60 Pan-And-Tilt Smart Security Cam
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Wyze introduced the Wyze Pan Cam, its first smart security camera featuring Ultra HD resolution.

articles.title: Nvidia Jetson AGX Thor dev kit from RS
articles.author: Eweekly
articles.summary: Jetson AGX Thor has been launched as a system-on-module intended to enhance robotic applications across various industries. The product supports generative AI models, including LLMs, VLMs, and Nvidia's VLA model, Isaac Groot N1. The product is a transformative leap in robotics and AI.

articles.title: Bio-Rad Expands Range of StarBright Dyes to Enhance Panel Design Capabilities for Spectral Flow Cytometry
articles.author: The Scientist
articles.summary: A new range of StarBright™ Dyes has been developed.

articles.title: NetBrands Corp Unveils Innovative Crypto Forward Website Leading the Way in Digital Web 3.0
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: NetBrands Corp. launched its newly designed website on August 25, 2025, reflecting its business shift in Web 3.0. The website provides an informative overview of the company's business direction within the digital asset space.

articles.title: Google Launches Pilot Program To Allow Cannabis Advertising In Canada
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google launched a temporary pilot program. The program allows Canada's cannabis businesses to advertise products on Google's search engine.

articles.title: SpyCloud Launches Consumer IDLink Product to Empower Financial Institutions to Combat Fraud with Holistic Identity Intelligence
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SpyCloud launched Consumer IDLink, a new API product, to empower financial institutions in combating fraud. The product provides advanced visibility into consumer identity exposures, helping to prevent account takeover, reduce fraud, and preserve trust. It allows financial institutions to know what criminals know.

articles.title: M&S launches major new online shopping service with eBay offering 'pre-loved' fashion
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: M&S is launching a new online store. The store allows shoppers to trade in unwanted clothing and purchase pre-loved fashion items.

articles.title: INTRODUCING THE NEWEST ADDITION TO THE DONNA KARAN BODY LINE: THE CASHMERE MIST MINI ANTI-PERSPIRANT STICK
articles.author: Williston Observer
articles.summary: Donna Karan New York is launching the Cashmere Mist Mini Anti-Perspirant Stick. This product is a new addition to the iconic Cashmere Mist Body Collection.

articles.title: Amazon beats out Dyson on price of its own powerful cordless vacuum
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Dyson V8 Advanced vacuum cleaner for a limited-time discounted price of £206.10, a reduction from its normal price of £329.99.

articles.title: Dyson Labor Day deals 2025: Save up to $500 on vacuums, Airwrap, air purifiers
articles.author: Cleveland
articles.summary: Dyson is offering Labor Day deals with significant discounts. These discounts apply to Dyson's vacuums, hair styling tools, and air purifiers.
